title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.57 - Tank truck cleaning and sanitizing facilities requirements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 2.57 - Tank truck cleaning and sanitizing facilities requirements

State Regulations

Facilities for cleaning and sanitizing of milk tank
trucks shall comply with items required for such purposes in milk plants as set
forth in this Part. Items 13p, 16p-19p and 21p shall not
apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
2.57

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
